title: Crypto Offload and Session Tokens
description: Katanemo is an OIDC compliant 3xA service, which means that it generates an idtoken, an accesstoken for users and API keys, and optionally a refresh_token as per the ODIC spec. These tokens are encrypted with an RSA256 (RS-256) signature key. You can retrieve the RSA public key via Katanemoâ€™s JSON Web Key Set (JWKS).
